content.title: Sttok's Information Security Policy Statement
content: The essential principles and guidelines on which Sttok's Information Security Policy is based are as follows:
• Develop our activities and processes towards understanding the needs of customers to ensure their full satisfaction, always following principles of transparency and integrity.
• Involve all Sttok members in the Information Security strategy, through participation in its development and implementation.
• Communication, cooperation and training of personnel are basic lines of action.

• Management promotes the professional development of employees, aware of their influence on commitment and motivation and, by extension, on the achievement of objectives and the Organization's Mission.
• Medium and long-term planning, with the establishment of priorities and objectives, to facilitate the progress of the Organization.
• Implementation of a continuous improvement system of activities, processes and services, identifying the most significant aspects that allow the search for improvement opportunities.
• Excellence in service, innovation and profit through efficiency, are aspects that should characterize our actions and collaborations, as well as the processes designed for this purpose.

• Ensure the Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability of information, as well as have the capacity to respond to emergency situations, establishing Business Continuity Plans proportional to the Organization's context, is a permanent attitude of Sttok.
• Establish specific Information Security objectives and have measures aimed at identifying and evaluating risks that may affect their achievement.

• The analysis and measurement of Information Security of all operational and support processes, through appropriate indicators, is essential to know their evolution and apply improvements in the objectives set.
• Management's commitment to compliance with the requirements of current legislation, other regulatory requirements and contractual obligations regarding information security.
